episodes.title: Kokariç
episodes.description: Nobody has to trade if they don't want to. A person is a person if he does not feel obliged to open a kokorec shop. There cannot be such an obligation.

episodes.title: Vatka
episodes.description: A movie from the 80s drags the group into a fashion debate crisis, and it pushes Yilmaz to stand behind his own opinion.

episodes.title: Nü Model
episodes.description: The naked story of the old Abidin who confronts his entire family.

episodes.title: Erasmus'la Gelen Yamyam
episodes.description: Ersoy's grandmother dies due to an unfortunate situation, the group stands by Ersoy to support him emotionally.

episodes.title: Yanlis Mentor
episodes.description: An old and wise man saves Yilmaz from a dangerous situation, Yilmaz realises there there can be lot to learn from him and makes him his mentor.

episodes.title: Karanlik Güç
episodes.description: Ilkkan and Yilmaz attend the apartment management meeting to fight a dark force awakening in their neighborhood.

episodes.title: Ikinci Yol
episodes.description: The loss of Ilkkan's grandmother opens a veil of secrecy about his family, Ilkkan decides to make an investigation about who he really is

episodes.title: Badana
episodes.description: Ilkkan and Yilmaz paints the walls of their houses. They will regret it.

episodes.title: Ayirtma Yenilemesi
episodes.description: There is nothing that Ilkkan cannot do to avoid losing his lover.

episodes.title: S1.E10 ∙ Kan Parasi
episodes.description: Yilmaz and Ilkkan get into debt to an interesting family.

episodes.title: S1.E11 ∙ Yilmaz Bey Banyo
episodes.description: Yilmaz wants to help old people in a way others cannot.

episodes.title: S1.E12 ∙ Atin Bulunusu
episodes.description: A small tribe living in Central Asia encounters a wild creature they have never encountered before. Only their Hakan(Khan) can lead them into the true path of salvation

episodes.title: Vücutçu Yalvaç
episodes.description: Ilkkan's nephew Yalvaç pays a visit to him. But the bodybuilding lifestyle of Yalvaç creates problems and controversies both in the group and in the neighborhood.

episodes.title: Kuki
episodes.description: Yilmaz and Ersoy start a charity campaign in the neighborhood to do a favor for a disabled child, Ilkkan gets into trouble to get rid of his debts and asks the group for help.

episodes.title: Bej
episodes.description: The group tries to help Yilmaz's nephew Kutay get the role he wants in a play.

episodes.title: Sokak Röportaji
episodes.description: Yilmaz, Ilkkan, and Ersoy get in trouble for something Yilmaz said and they try to flee the city.

episodes.title: Çaça ve Cosplay
episodes.description: Yilmaz finds it strange what Ilkkan and Ersoy do under the influence of their girlfriends.

episodes.title: Iki Içi Disi Bir Kisi
episodes.description: When Ersoy's shoot-from-the-hip uncle starts causing mayhem both in the group and in the neighborhood, Yilmaz and Ilkkan summons an old friend for help.

episodes.title: Gelin Basi
episodes.description: Yilmaz and Ilkkan get competitive about helping their friend Ersoy show-off at a wedding.

episodes.title: Resimdeki Ünlü
episodes.description: Ilkkan solves a puzzle, in which the name of a child celebrity is asked. Ilkkan, Yilmaz and Ersoy are trying to find out who this person is.

episodes.title: Esref Hidayet Gürdal Kültür Merkezi
episodes.description: Ilkkan and Yilmaz are locked in a room of a cultural center with a dance team, waiting to be rescued.

episodes.title: Vita Brevis
episodes.description: While the Senate of the Roman Republic is prosecuting a senator declared a traitor by the Emperor, one of the senators unintentionally finds a new method of execution.

episodes.title: Sarisin ve Kotlu
episodes.description: Yilmaz, Ilkkan and Ersoy become matchmakers for their desperate friend, eventually finding themselves in a series of unexpected events.

episodes.title: Keskin Nisanci
episodes.description: Yilmaz, Illkan and Ersoy unintentionally interfere a police operation, then dedicate themselves to solve the case.

episodes.title: Büfe
episodes.description: Yilmaz, Illkan and Ersoy try to help a friend for transportation of an opulent and timeless dresser to a small town.

episodes.title: Sinifsal Veda
episodes.description: Yilmaz, Ilkkan and Ersoy try to catch up with the new life style of their close friend.

episodes.title: Mazbut Bir Hayat Saglam Bir Ahlak Bol Bol Sevgi
episodes.description: Yilmaz and Ersoy struggle to put together a dinner table before Ilkkan's guests arrive.

episodes.title: Ghosting
episodes.description: Yilmaz finds a DVD in trash and gets to the bottom of it.

episodes.title: Tesekkürler
episodes.description: Yilmaz, Ilkkan and Ersoy help their actor friend on his new movie.

episodes.title: Gülnuray
episodes.description: The strange tale of the relationship between Yilmaz and Gulnuray, the housekeeper.

episodes.title: Bilanço
episodes.description: In the night that started with the "Bilanco" game; Yilmaz, Ilkkan, Ersoy and their friends talk about their secrets.

episodes.title: Birinci Kabak
episodes.description: Yilmaz, Ilkkan and Ersoy go to a fair to meet with the queen in 17th century France.
